page.title: 07Lifestyles in Saxilby Area
page.content: Despite its proximity to Lincoln, Saxilby is still essentially rural in its reflection of fashion and beauty, the teenagers and young single working people being the ones to follow the changing clothing fashions. It is probably the same young people and married couples where both partners are working who go out of the village for social contacts, shopping, leisure activities and entertainment such as clubs, pubs and cinemas. The older population whilst patronising local hairdressers and shopping in Lincoln for clothes are more conservative in dress and appearance. The influence of social contacts made through school and work and its location are evident here, many people commuting out of the village to work. For the elderly and parents of young children the focus of social life probably lies in Saxilby.
